Lacuna

 

Frame

We custom design, build and hand finish beautiful frames for your artworks. Catering for the artist community in the east end of Glasgow and home makers far and wide.

We've mastered a whole range of finishes from natural wood and stained, to gilded and sprayed. All of our designs use conservation techniques meaning that your artwork is well protected.

Tell us about your idea or ask us for our suggestions. We can help find the best solution for any artwork whether its a restoration project or a gallery exhibit.

Stretch

In our Bridgeton workshop we build quality made-to-measure stretcher frames for artists. We can supply various profiles and depths depending on your requirements.

If you are interested in canvas supports we can stretch these for you also. Let us know how you would like your support of choice to be prepped either with rabbit skin glue, gesso or a thixotropic primer.

Connect

Send us an email with your requirements or come down to the workshop to talk about ideas. Just call ahead
